V1 MIGRATION INFO:
  * V1 WITHDRAWAL AND CONVERSION TOOL
  * LEGACY GUIDE: Withdrawing from v1 pool, quickswap, and converting tokens to v2.

TOKEN:
  * Symbol: MEME (v2)
  * Anti-whale  (0.1% Max total supply transfer amount)
  * 5% Transfer Fee - 2% Burned, 3% added to liquidity
  * 500 Tokens Pre-mined: 400 to LP & 100 For Promotions and Costs during v1, and v2 supply is entirely bootstrapped from current MEME holders converting to v2.
  * V1 Liquidity Locked (v2 coming soon): 0xB6b9f14A318063BA44D5f21D34fEF0E1016ECA8c

FARMING:
  * Masterchef: 0xFd713726a28f45cEBCD2c9088BD2084De836e86F
  * Farming Starts on Block: 15929420 — Sun Jun 20 2021 03:06:46 GMT-0400 (Eastern Daylight Time)
  * First Harvest Start: block 16015969
  * Harvest Cooldowns:
      - Native:     4 Hours
      - Non-Native: 8 Hours

DEPOSIT FEES:
  * 0% On Native Farms
  * 2% On Non-Native Farms *** ONLY 1% until june 25th 2021 12pm EST ***

NOTES:
  * dQUICK has no liquidity pool so token price and market cap will be 0. This does not affect farming rewards!
  * Use 6% slippage when swapping tokens due to transfer fee.
